results.title: Simvastatin induces apoptosis in human colon cancer cells and in tumor xenografts, and attenuates colitis-associated colon cancer in mice.
results.text_hl: These results suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ could be a potential chemopreventive and therapeutic agent of @<m>DISEASE_Colitis_Associated_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000083023 @@@CAC@@@ as well as de novo @DISEASE_Colorectal_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D015179 @@@colon cancer@@@.

citations.NLM: Cho SJ, Kim JS, Kim JM, Lee JY, Jung HC, Song IS. Simvastatin induces apoptosis in human colon cancer cells and in tumor xenografts, and attenuates colitis-associated colon cancer in mice. Int J Cancer. 2008 Aug 15;123(4):951-7. PMID: 18521906
